comments.content: This card is really the "make or break" of this entire Emyn Muil scenario.  Draw a rockslide when everyone is exhausted to quest and a bunch of people die, don't draw one and you do fine. I hate this scenario so much for it's lame mechanics and ridiculous solution to hurting players..."Let's just deal two damage to everything with this card, that'll stop em." Well it certainly does do that.
Sorry for posting this twice guys, accidental.

The solution is simple, do not quest with everyone. While you have to quest a lot before you clear starting locations, once this is done you can just throw a a couple of allies to quest, so your heroes will be relatively safe.
Another solution would be A Test of Will or Eleanor
